```{r}

               visNetwork,tidyverse)
```

```{r}
MC1 <- fromJSON("data/MC1.json")

```

```{r}
MC1_nodes<- as_tibble(MC1$nodes) %>%
  select(id,type,country)

MC1_edges<- as_tibble(MC1$links) %>%
  select(source,target, type, weight,key)
```
